about: I'm Gabriel Lyane Arevalo, a Data Analyst passionate about making data work smarter, not harder. I focus on building scalable, automated systems that streamline internal workflows, helping teams make better decisions faster. My work blends data engineering, automation, and business intelligence.

Over the past year, I've designed end-to-end data pipelines using Python, Flask & SQLAlchemy, and Microsoft Fabric (Power BI and DataFlows). I've also built custom automation tools for document scanning, data collection, and internal calculators that support business needs.

Throughout the development of these projects, I keep things clear, efficient, and practical. I aim to create tools that don't just deliver accurate results but also fit seamlessly into everyday workflows. My goal is to turn manual, repetitive tasks into automated, reliable solutions that save time and deliver high-quality data for strategy, sales, and leadership.

projects.title: Netflix Relational Database
